label: 管領
本: The Cambridge History of Japan, Volume 3:  Medieval Japan . Cambridge University Press . 1990
説明文: A high official of the Muromachi bakufu who assisted the shogun in all important government affairs. The post was not hereditary but was rotated among members of the Shiba, Hosokawa, and Hatakeyama families, who were thus known as the sankanrei or three deputies"; see Kantō kanrei.　[斯波、細川、畠山、関東管領]　"
